DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare effect arzoxifene raloxifene bone mineral density ( bone strength ) .
DOC.brief_title: Study Comparing Arzoxifene With Raloxifene Women After Menopause With Osteoporosis
DOC.criteria: Must osteoporosis Must 50 75 year old able walk Have least two back bone xrayed Have period least two year Be willing blood test Have bone disease osteoporosis History estrogen dependent cancer History stroke certain heart problem Possibly allergy raloxifene arzoxifene Have certain abnormal lab value History seizure disorder Have unexplained vaginal bleeding abnormal pap smear
